description: This week, both our winners on the insightful side come to our post about the media’s widespread misrepresentation of the Supreme Court’s ruling in the Murthy case. In first place, it’s Drew Wilson, who shares our frustration with this kind of thing: In second place, it’s Rocky with a response to the claim that Mike […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
